hallway-study.title: Ornate Temple Corridor
hallway-study.description: A real-time environment study focusing on modular architecture, procedural texturing, and volumetric lighting.
hallway-study.details:
Software: Unreal Engine, Substance Designer, ZBrush, ComfyUI
Techniques: High-to-low poly baking, PBR material authoring, procedural generation, dynamic lighting

media.title: Final Render
media.description: The primary cinematic shot showcasing the repeating architectural elements and the interplay of volumetric light and shadow.

media.title: Wireframe & Topology
media.description: A technical breakdown showing the optimized mesh topology of the modular assets used to construct the scene.

media.title: Lighting & Composition Overlay
media.description: An analysis of the scene's composition and lighting setup, highlighting key lights and post-processing volumes.

media.title: Procedural Texture Graph (ComfyUI)
media.description: The node-based graph from ComfyUI used to generate the intricate patterns and materials for the ceiling and pillars.

media.title: Moodboard & Key References
media.description: A collection of the primary architectural and artistic references that inspired the final design and mood of the environment.

media.title: Ultrawide Cinematic Shot
media.description: An alternate, wider composition that emphasizes the scale and grandeur of the temple corridor.

3d-work-2.title: Organic Architecture
3d-work-2.description: Procedural architecture blending natural forms with modern design principles.
3d-work-2.details:
Software: Maya, Houdini, Substance Suite
Inspiration: Biomimetic design patterns
Techniques: Procedural modeling, L-systems
Project duration: 3 weeks

media.title: Final Architecture
media.description: The completed organic architecture structure with natural lighting.

media.title: Concept Sketches
media.description: Initial design concepts and biomimetic inspiration references.

media.title: Procedural Network
media.description: Houdini node network showing the procedural generation process.

media.title: Growth Animation
media.description: Time-lapse animation showing the organic growth simulation.

3d-work-3.title: Futuristic Cityscape
3d-work-3.description: A detailed futuristic city environment with neon lighting and dynamic weather effects.
3d-work-3.details:
Created using: Unreal Engine 5, Houdini, Substance Painter
Polygon count: 3M triangles
Texture resolution: 4K PBR materials

media.title: Cityscape View
media.description: Main view of the futuristic city with neon lights.

media.title: City Animation
media.description: Flythrough animation of the city environment.

3d-work-4.title: Alien Landscape
3d-work-4.description: An alien planet environment featuring exotic flora and terrain.
3d-work-4.details:
Software: Houdini, Unreal Engine 5, Substance Designer
Project duration: 4 weeks
Unique procedural flora system

media.title: Alien Terrain
media.description: Wide shot of the alien landscape with unique vegetation.

media.title: Flora Details
media.description: Close-up view of the exotic flora with unique textures.

plugin-1.title: Terrain Generator Plugin
plugin-1.description: Custom Maya plugin for procedural terrain generation with real-time preview.
plugin-1.details:
Language: Python, C++ API
Features: Real-time preview, Export to game engines
Compatibility: Maya 2020-2024
Performance: Optimized for large terrains

media.title: Plugin Interface
media.description: The main user interface showing terrain generation controls and real-time preview.

media.title: Live Demo
media.description: Real-time demonstration of terrain generation with parameter adjustments.

media.title: Generated Terrains
media.description: Various terrain examples created using different parameter settings.

media.title: Code Structure
media.description: Overview of the plugin architecture and key code components.

plugin-2.title: Procedural Foliage Plugin
plugin-2.description: A Houdini plugin for generating procedural foliage with customizable parameters.
plugin-2.details:
Language: Python, Houdini VEX
Features: Real-time preview, Export to Unreal Engine
Compatibility: Houdini 18+
Performance: Optimized for large forests

media.title: Plugin Interface
media.description: User interface of the procedural foliage plugin.

media.title: Live Demo
media.description: Demonstration of foliage generation in real-time.

plugin-3.title: Material Blending Plugin
plugin-3.description: A Substance Designer plugin for advanced material blending techniques.
plugin-3.details:
Language: C++, Substance Designer API
Features: Layer blending, Mask generation
Compatibility: Substance Designer 2021+
Performance: GPU accelerated

media.title: Material Blending UI
media.description: User interface showing material blending controls.

media.title: Blending Results
media.description: Example of blended materials with different parameters.

industrial-1.description: Sustainable furniture design with modular components and eco-friendly materials.
